Use of Active ROM Findings
Active ROM testing is required to measure functional loss as is utilized in DCs based on LOM.
Note
:Â  Passive ROM is for consideration in evaluating painful motion, as described in
38 CFR 4.59
and
M21-1, Part V, Subpart iii, 1.A.1
.
title: M21-1, Part V, Subpart iii, Chapter 1, Section A - Painful Motion and Functional Loss
citation: Part V, Subpart iii, Chapter 1, Section A
